attributes.action: Raise stamp duty threshold to £250K for 1st time purchasers
attributes.additional_details:
The Coservative Party Manifesto 2010 said: We want to create a property-owning democracy where everyone has the chance to own their own home. That is why we will permanently raise the stamp duty threshold to £250,000 for first-time buyers, meaning nine out of ten of them will pay no tax on their first
home purchase.
